Articles.Content:
How do I see what kerbals are inside a specific capsule? I've look through the controls and can't find anything on this.

Cheers.

When you are in control of that specific capsule, on the bottom right of the screen is a display of who is in the capsule, it has to be manned however and the only way to see this box at the bottom right is to be in control of that capsule.
Easiest way is to install Crew Manifest
No, easiest way is to left click on the door. A window will popup with all the Kerbals currently inside that capsule.
